thread.title: LET THEM FIGHT: Howard Dean goes to war against Chuck Schumer and Tim Kaine
thread.title_full: LET THEM FIGHT: Howard Dean goes to war against Chuck Schumer and Tim Kaine

author: Greg P.
title: LET THEM FIGHT: Howard Dean goes to war against Chuck Schumer and Tim Kaine
text:
LET THEM FIGHT: Howard Dean goes to war against Chuck Schumer and Tim Kaine Posted at 6:29   Share on Facebook Share on Twitter 
There’s nothing like a little civil war in the Democratic party to brighten your weekend. 
Here’s former presidential candidate and MSNBC curmudgeon Howard Dean going after Vice Presidential loser Sen. Tim Kaine of Virginia: If we turn our backs on widows and orphans fleeing the very evil we despise, we do not defeat our enemies; we surrender to them 
— Senator Tim Kaine (@timkaine) January 28, 2017 Tim, this is great but the Dems in the Senate actually have to do something about this stuff. You are being left behind by your base https://t.co/Ul5K4nzmqe 
— Howard Dean (@GovHowardDean) January 29, 2017 
Dean later directed his guns at current Senate Minority Leader Chuck Schumer: Chuck Schumer vows to fight Trump immigration order https://t.co/P4kxawh9nA pic.twitter.com/rLf8G3KEvl 
— HuffPost Politics (@HuffPostPol) January 29, 2017 How about fighting some of the ridiculous cabinet appointments Trump is making. https://t.co/ITeRAA77TQ 
— Howard Dean (@GovHowardDean) January 29, 2017 
Let them fight! Trending Whoops! WaPo's Glenn Kessler explains difference between Obama & Trump bans, accidentally indicts MSM 
He’s also mad at state attorney’s general for not filing suit in state courts to allow state troopers to begin arresting non-compliant Customs and Border Protection officers at the airports: New statement from Attorney's General in NY, CA, PA, WA, MA, HI, VA, OR, DC, CT, VT, IL, NM, IA, ME & MD re Trump's #MuslimBan pic.twitter.com/pd5KMY9XNL 
— Jesse Ferguson (@JesseFFerguson) January 29, 2017 Statement is great. How about filing in state court so ultimately we can use state police to arrest non compliant CBP officers https://t.co/osnk0mQjUa 
— Howard Dean (@GovHowardDean) January 29, 2017 
Come on, governor! List the states you hate like this… 
***
